targets.expr:
(
  sum(app_git_commit{job="$node"}) by (git_hash)
)
   + on(job) group_left(version)
(
   0 * sum(app_version{job="$node"}) by (version)
)
   + on(job) group_left(lock_hash)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_lock_hash{job="$node"}) by (lock_hash)
)
   + on(job) group_left(peer_name)
(
   0 * sum(app_peer_name{job="$node"}) by (peer_name)
)
   + on(job) group_left(network)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_network{job="$node"}) by (network)
)

panels.description: Node is healthy if Beacon Node connected and synced and at least quorum peers are connected.
panels.title: Healthy

panels.description: Number of partial signatures collected per voluntary exiting validator.
panels.title: Voluntary Exits

panels.description: Total balance of validators with links to beaconcha.in for each public key.
panels.title: Validators
